Headline: Keep food fresh with this one-day deal on a FoodSaver vacuum sealer
Article_Body: No need to resign yourself to eating nothing but canned food while quarantine continues for another month. Prevent meat, fish and poultry from going bad with this deal on a FoodSaver vacuum-sealing appliance, on sale for under $90 at Woot! for just one day.  FoodSaver GM700000 GameSaver Big Game Plus Vacuum, Black ($89.99, originally $136.99; woot.com) This vacuum sealer, which was designed to seal up to 80 consecutive bags or 240 pounds of food, removes air from its specially designed bags, and then applies heat so meats, fish and poultry stay fresh and are protected from freezer burn.  The FoodSaver also features a removable, dishwasher-safe drip tray, extra-wide sealing strip, and built-in roll storage and bag cutter so you can customize the length of your bags. Plus it comes with one 11-inch-by-10-foot heat seal roll, one 8-inch-by-10-foot heat seal roll, five 1-quart precut heat seal bags, five 1-gallon precut heat seal bags, and an accessory hose. Just be sure to seal this deal soon; it will only be available while supplies last or until midnight Tuesday. For more great deals, check out CNN Coupons.  Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
